content: dawson the bear stands about 18 inches tall sitting is about 12 inches i was searching for a teddy bear pattern to make for a friend for her newborn baby i could not find one that i liked that wasn t small so i made my own the pattern is named after the little boy who inspired it i hope you enjoy let me know if you have any questions this is my first published pattern if you notice any typos please let me know enjoy the pattern just please give me credit for the pattern when selling the finished product or posting
